thread.title: With Exit Exam scrapped, search for now-qualified graduates is on
thread.title_full: With Exit Exam scrapped, search for now-qualified graduates is on - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jill Tucker
title: With Exit Exam scrapped, search for now-qualified graduates is on
text:
Photo: Lea Suzuki, The Chronicle Zuleima Giron, City College of San Francisco student, wipes off a chalkboard at the end of her English class at City College of San Francisco on Monday, October 12, 2015 in San Francisco, Calif. Zuleima Giron, City College of San Francisco student, wipes off a...
Sifting through old high school transcripts and searching for names on Facebook, school officials across California are scrambling to hand out thousands of diplomas to former students, many of whom gave up on graduating and don’t realize they’re now eligible. Zuleima Giron, City College of San Francisco student, wipes off a chalkboard at the end of her English class at City College of San Francisco on Monday, October 12, 2015 in San Francisco, Calif. Zuleima Giron, City College of San Francisco student, wipes off a...
Sifting through old high school transcripts and searching for names on Facebook, school officials across California are scrambling to hand out thousands of diplomas to former students, many of whom gave up on graduating and don’t realize they’re now eligible.
